metadata.job_to_be_done: Plan a trip of 4 days for a group of 10 college friends.

extracted_sections.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
South of France - Restaurants and Hotels.pdf
South of France - Tips and Tricks.pdf

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Nice Old Town (Vieux Nice): A charming historic district with narrow cobblestone streets, colorful buildings, and bustling markets. Perfect for group exploration with budget-friendly cafes and photo opportunities. Best visited in the morning to avoid crowds.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Beaches and Coastal Activities Safety Guidelines: Essential safety tips for beach activities including swimming conditions, group supervision protocols, and emergency contact information. Important for large college groups visiting coastal areas.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Restaurants and Hotels.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Budget-Friendly Accommodations - Hostel Recommendations: Affordable group accommodation options with shared facilities, common areas, and group booking discounts. Ideal for college budget constraints with good location access.

Local Food Markets - Seasonal Produce Guide: Guide to fresh local ingredients and seasonal specialties available at regional markets. Helpful for group meal planning and experiencing authentic local culture on a budget.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Tips and Tricks.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Group Travel Tips - Booking Coordination: Strategies for coordinating bookings, payments, and schedules for large groups. Includes tips for group discounts and managing different preferences and budgets.
